characters.name: Fire Mage
characters.description: A powerful mage who wields the destructive power of fire magic.

characters.name: Ice Warrior
characters.description: A resilient warrior who uses ice magic to protect and attack.

characters.name: Lightning Archer
characters.description: A swift archer who channels lightning through their arrows.

characters.name: Earth Guardian
characters.description: A defensive specialist who uses earth magic to protect allies.

characters.name: Wind Assassin
characters.description: A stealthy assassin who moves like the wind.

characters.name: Water Healer
characters.description: A compassionate healer who uses water magic to restore health.

characters.name: Shadow Rogue
characters.description: A mysterious rogue who manipulates shadows for stealth and deception.

characters.name: Light Paladin
characters.description: A holy warrior who wields the power of light to smite evil.

characters.name: Dark Necromancer
characters.description: A sinister mage who commands the undead and dark magic.

characters.name: Nature Druid
characters.description: A wise druid who harnesses the power of nature and transformation.

characters.name: Metal Berserker
characters.description: A fierce warrior who channels metal magic for devastating attacks.

characters.name: Crystal Sorcerer
characters.description: A mystical sorcerer who wields the power of crystals and gems.

characters.name: Thunder Monk
characters.description: A disciplined monk who channels thunder through martial arts.

characters.name: Frost Ranger
characters.description: A skilled ranger who uses frost magic to control the battlefield.

characters.name: Inferno Warlock
characters.description: A powerful warlock who commands infernal flames and demons.

characters.name: Storm Knight
characters.description: A noble knight who wields storm magic and heavy armor.

characters.name: Void Assassin
characters.description: A deadly assassin who manipulates the void for teleportation and stealth.

characters.name: Holy Priest
characters.description: A divine priest who channels holy magic for healing and protection.

characters.name: Chaos Mage
characters.description: An unpredictable mage who wields chaotic and unstable magic.

characters.name: Iron Defender
characters.description: A stalwart defender who uses iron magic for unbreakable defense.

characters.name: Arcane Scholar
characters.description: A learned scholar who studies and wields ancient arcane magic.

characters.name: Blood Berserker
characters.description: A savage berserker who draws power from blood and rage.

characters.name: Time Mage
characters.description: A mysterious mage who manipulates time and temporal magic.

characters.name: Spirit Shaman
characters.description: A spiritual shaman who communicates with spirits and ancestors.

characters.name: Cosmic Wanderer
characters.description: A mysterious wanderer who wields the power of the cosmos.

characters.name: Elemental Master
characters.description: A master of all elements who can combine their powers.
